src_original: sukhaduḥkhamanyonyasaṃgatam ||119 ||  vedanāsamudayaḥ kasya pratyayād hetuḥ kaśca bhavati vedanāyāḥ |
tgt_original: 『此痛何由而生？ 』當作是觀察時，由更樂而有此痛。

src_original: jñāsīd vedanā jāyate sparśataḥ ||120 ||  sparśasamudayaḥ kasya pratyayād,  hetuḥ kaśca bhavati sparśasya |
tgt_original: 『此更樂何由而有？ 』我生此念時，緣六入而有此更樂。

src_original: jñāsīd sparśaḥ jāyate ṣaḍāyatanataḥ ||121 ||  ṣaḍāyatanasamudayaḥ kasya pratyayād,  hetuḥ kaśca bhavati ṣaḍāyatanasya
